Title: Voodoo Shader Framework
Description: Voodoo Shader is a comprehensive graphics framework for powering shaders in multiple programs, during development or after release. Voodoo uses plugins and a shared core to support many games and other applications and is compatible with Direct3D and OpenGL.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Voodoo Shader is a comprehensive graphics framework for powering shaders in multiple programs, during development or after release. Voodoo uses plugins and a shared core to support many games and other applications and is compatible with Direct3D and OpenGL.

The Voodoo Shader project has been relocated to Github:
https://github.com/peachykeen/VoodooShader
